00019 template <class Type, class Accessor = DefaultAccessor<Type> >
00020 class TSmartPtr: public TTransPtr<Type>
00021 {
00022 public:
00023        typedef TTransPtr<Type> BaseClass;
00024        typedef typename BaseClass::RefCountBase RefCountBase;
00025 
00026        TSmartPtr();
00027        explicit TSmartPtr(Type* pointer);
00028        TSmartPtr(const TTransPtr<Type>& pointer);
00029        TSmartPtr(const TSmartPtr& pointer);
00030 
00034        void SetPtr(Type* pointer);
00035 
00040        template <class SourceType>
00041        bool SetCastedOrRemove(SourceType* pointer)
00042        {
00043               Type* castedPtr = dynamic_cast<Type*>(pointer);
00044 
00045               SetPtr(castedPtr);
00046 
00047               if (castedPtr != NULL){
00048                      return true;
00049               }
00050               else{
00051                      Accessor::Delete(pointer);
00052 
00053                      return false;
00054               }
00055        }
00056 
00057        // operators
00058        TSmartPtr& operator=(const TTransPtr<Type>& pointer);
00059        TSmartPtr& operator=(const TSmartPtr& pointer);
00060 
00061 protected:
00062        class RefCounter: public RefCountBase
00063        {
00064        public:
00065               typedef RefCountBase BaseClass;
00066 
00067               RefCounter(Type* pointer)
00068               :      BaseClass(pointer)
00069               {
00070                      m_count = 1;
00071               }
00072 
00073               // reimplemented (RefCountBase)
00074               virtual void OnAttached()
00075               {
00076                      Q_ASSERT(IsValid());
00077                      Q_ASSERT(m_count > 0);
00078 
00079                      ++m_count;
00080               }
00081 
00082               virtual void OnDetached()
00083               {
00084                      Q_ASSERT(IsValid());
00085                      Q_ASSERT(m_count > 0);
00086 
00087                      if (--m_count <= 0){
00088                             Accessor::Delete(BaseClass::GetPtr());
00089 
00090                             delete this;
00091                      }
00092               }
00093 
00094        private:
00095               int m_count;
00096        };
00097 };
00098

00100 template <class Type, class Accessor>
00101 TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::TSmartPtr()
00102        :BaseClass()
00103 {
00104        BaseClass::m_counterPtr = NULL;
00105 }
00106 
00107 
00108 template <class Type, class Accessor>
00109 TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::TSmartPtr(Type* pointer)
00110        :BaseClass()
00111 {
00112        BaseClass::m_counterPtr = new RefCounter(pointer);
00113 }
00114 
00115 
00116 template <class Type, class Accessor>
00117 TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::TSmartPtr(const TTransPtr<Type>& pointer)
00118        :BaseClass()
00119 {
00120        BaseClass::m_counterPtr = GetInternalCounter(pointer);
00121 
00122        if (BaseClass::m_counterPtr != NULL){
00123               BaseClass::m_counterPtr->OnAttached();
00124        }
00125 }
00126

00128 template <class Type, class Accessor>
00129 TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::TSmartPtr(const TSmartPtr& pointer)
00130        :BaseClass()
00131 {
00132        BaseClass::m_counterPtr = BaseClass::GetInternalCounter(pointer);
00133 
00134        if (BaseClass::m_counterPtr != NULL){
00135               BaseClass::m_counterPtr->OnAttached();
00136        }
00137 }

00139 
00140 template <class Type, class Accessor>
00141 inline void TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::SetPtr(Type* pointer)
00142 {
00143        BaseClass::Detach();
00144 
00145        if (pointer != NULL){
00146               BaseClass::m_counterPtr = new RefCounter(pointer);
00147        }
00148        else{
00149               BaseClass::m_counterPtr = NULL;
00150        }
00151 }
00152 
00153 
00154 template <class Type, class Accessor>
00155 TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>& TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::operator=(const TTransPtr<Type>& pointer)
00156 {
00157        RefCountBase* pointerInternalCounter = BaseClass::GetInternalCounter(pointer);
00158 
00159        if (pointerInternalCounter != BaseClass::m_counterPtr){
00160               Q_ASSERT((pointerInternalCounter == NULL) || (BaseClass::m_counterPtr == NULL) || (*pointerInternalCounter != *BaseClass::m_counterPtr)); // two different reference counters cannot shown at the same destination object
00161 
00162               BaseClass::Detach();
00163 
00164               BaseClass::m_counterPtr = pointerInternalCounter;
00165 
00166               if (BaseClass::m_counterPtr != NULL){
00167                      BaseClass::m_counterPtr->OnAttached();
00168               }
00169        }
00170 
00171        return *this;
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00175 template <class Type, class Accessor>
00176 TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>& TSmartPtr<Type, Accessor>::operator=(const TSmartPtr& pointer)
00177 {
00178        RefCountBase* pointerInternalCounter = BaseClass::GetInternalCounter(pointer);
00179 
00180        if (pointerInternalCounter != BaseClass::m_counterPtr){
00181               Q_ASSERT((pointerInternalCounter == NULL) || (BaseClass::m_counterPtr == NULL) || (*pointerInternalCounter != *BaseClass::m_counterPtr)); // two different reference counters cannot shown at the same destination object
00182 
00183               BaseClass::Detach();
00184 
00185               BaseClass::m_counterPtr = pointerInternalCounter;
00186 
00187               if (BaseClass::m_counterPtr != NULL){
00188                      BaseClass::m_counterPtr->OnAttached();
00189               }
00190        }
00191 
00192        return *this;
00193 }
